item.title: Software Developer
item.description: @ Beta80 Spa Implemented a flow to handle alarms and critical events for Unicredit S.p.A. using Apache Nifi and its expression language. Alarms are gathered by a JMS queue, enriched with metadata and forwarded to a Fastweb Host in a CSV and to a Unicredit syslog server. The entire flow counts more than one hunded processors, is replicated on three nodes using zookeeper embedded and is capable of handling several thousands of alarms each minute having minimum impact on the nodes.
